channel.title: Surface on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Surface on Dash

item.title: On Surface Pro
item.description: Yes, two weeks ago I bought a surface pro, following is the steps for me to discover on Surface Pro. Remote Viewer Since the remote desktop server is not installed on surface pro, I have to install the remote viewer, I choose TeamViewer, the steps is quite easy. But it requires both side(client and server)both could reach internet. TeamViewer Download: http://www.teamviewer.com/zhcn/download/windows.aspx You can also install teamviewer from the yaourt of ArchLinux.
